name: Context Loader
description: Heavy context loading agent. Loads 20-50k tokens of relevant material upfront to reduce downstream re-search. Compute is cheap; senior engineer attention is expensive.
default_objective: Load and synthesize context from {{context_sources}} relevant to {{task_focus}}. Produce a context summary for downstream agents.

parameters.name: context_sources
parameters.default: codebase, documentation, and previous run artifacts
parameters.title: Context Sources

parameters.name: task_focus
parameters.title: Task Focus
parameters.description: What the context should be relevant to

parameters.name: token_budget
parameters.title: Token Budget
parameters.description: Target context size in tokens (20k-50k recommended)

parameters.name: include_history
parameters.title: Include History
parameters.description: Whether to include git history and previous runs
